description: Development of Regional Physical Planning Centers (Decentralized Planning Participation and Partnership DP3)

subproject.description: The project aims to promote good governance and include institutional transformation by decentralizing decision-making process and applying participatory planning methods in preparing and executing physical plans for human settlements. This aim will be achieved through building the capacities of the General Organization for Physical Planning (GOPP) by providing training to GOPP staff, regional physical planning centers and local administrations on the use of modern physical planning technologies. The project will address barriers to plan execution, in particular legal and financial matters; and attempts to institutionalize the new physical participatory planning technologies.
subproject.title: Dev. of Reg. Physical Planning

title: Decentralized Planning, Participation & Partnership DP3
